the east, a lovely gazebo. South lies the garden, and eventually,
Camelot itself. To the west is a deep dense forest.

camelot102@camelot.title: Rough Tunnel
camelot102@camelot.description:
You stand in a narrow, roughly formed tunnel. To the east you see
the mouth of the cave, while to the west the tunnel seems to branch.

camelot251@camelot.title: Atop The Western Gatetower
camelot251@camelot.description:
Guardsmen perched atop the tower here have a commanding view of the
surrounding lands. With a few bows, and a ballista or two, you
could hold off an army for months.

masha@camelot.name: masha
masha@camelot.description: Masha the Kobold Guardsman is here.

keijo@camelot.name: keijo
keijo@camelot.description: Keijo is daydreaming. He hates to be bothered.

misha@camelot.name: misha
misha@camelot.description: Misha the Kobold Guardsman is here.

tapi@camelot.name: tapi
tapi@camelot.description: Tapi is very angry. You've interrupted his lunch.

tristam@camelot.name: tristam
tristam@camelot.description: Sir Tristam of Lyoness is here, thinking about his Lady, Isolde.

bultsi@camelot.name: bultsi
bultsi@camelot.description: Bultsi the guard watches you suspiciously.

ector@camelot.name: ector
ector@camelot.description: Sir Ector has a new sword. He wants to try it out on you!

bedmonster@camelot.name: bedmonster
bedmonster@camelot.description: The monster under the bed leaps out and grabs your ankles!

pomo@camelot.name: pomo
pomo@camelot.description: Pomo takes one look at you and falls down laughing.

vesa@camelot.name: vesa
vesa@camelot.description: Vesa is here, polishing his sword.

mira@camelot.name: mira
mira@camelot.description: Mira looks at you and growls 'What're you doing in here bub?'

titivilus@camelot.name: titivilus
titivilus@camelot.description: Uh Oh, looks like Merlin forgot to feed the demons this morning...

bulla@camelot.name: bulla
bulla@camelot.description: Bulla the off-duty guardsman is here.

morsha@camelot.name: morsha
morsha@camelot.description: Morsha the Kobold Guardsman is here.

bruce@camelot.name: bruce
bruce@camelot.description: Bruce the kobold butler looks at you and raises his eyebrow scornfully.

brunno@camelot.name: brunno
brunno@camelot.description: Brunno growls deep in his throat.

tarrasque@camelot.name: tarrasque
tarrasque@camelot.description: The Tarrasque is hungry. You'd make a nice snack.

gromph@camelot.name: gromph
gromph@camelot.description: Oh no! The moat monster is about to eat you!

falcon@camelot.name: falcon
falcon@camelot.description: You've come too near this falcon's roost.

jeeves@camelot.name: jeeves
jeeves@camelot.description: Jeeves says 'You may wait in the sitting room until the Master arrives.'

cavelion@camelot.name: cavelion
cavelion@camelot.description: You are just in time to join the Cave Lion for lunch.

helius@camelot.name: helius
helius@camelot.description: Sir Helius has had a bit much to drink. Such a nasty drunk too!

fang@camelot.name: fang
fang@camelot.description: Fang snarls as he leaps for your throat!

helsa@camelot.name: helsa
helsa@camelot.description: Helsa, Merlin's maid is bustling around cleaning everything.

aki@camelot.name: aki
aki@camelot.description: Aki grabs his sword in suprise when you walk in.

amon@camelot.name: amon
amon@camelot.description: Amon snarls at you and leaps forward to the attack.

kalle@camelot.name: kalle
kalle@camelot.description: Kalle looks at you in suprise.

percy@camelot.name: percy
percy@camelot.description: Percy the Major Domo looks down his nose at you.

centipede@camelot.name: centipede
centipede@camelot.description: There is a giant centipede crawling down the wall towards you.

mordred@camelot.name: mordred
mordred@camelot.description: Sir Mordred wants Arthurs Crown. He thinks you may have it.

tomi@camelot.name: tomi
tomi@camelot.description: Tomi asks if you are lost.

jussy@camelot.name: jussy
jussy@camelot.description: Jussy is on patrol here. He doesn't seem to trust you.

someone@camelot.name: someone
someone@camelot.description: Sir Garlon the invisible knight has just disappeared!

kamu@camelot.name: kamu
kamu@camelot.description: Kamu says 'Hey, aren't you the thief we chased out of here last week?'

bankguard@camelot.name: bankguard
bankguard@camelot.description:
The Bankguard says "Hold it right there buddy! Where do you think
you're going?"

gramph@camelot.name: gramph
gramph@camelot.description: On no! The moat monster is about to eat you!

kuppi@camelot.name: kuppi
kuppi@camelot.description: Kuppi got demoted yesterday, and boy is he mad!

pallo@camelot.name: pallo
pallo@camelot.description: Pallo says 'Hey you! Hold it right there!'

launcelot@camelot.name: launcelot
launcelot@camelot.description: Sir Launcelot Du Lake is here, ready to defend his King against all comers.

chef@camelot.name: chef
chef@camelot.description: Jean-Claude the Chef is fixing a marvelous feast for tonight!

lamorak@camelot.name: lamorak
lamorak@camelot.description: Sir Lamorak stands before you, ready to do battle.

moloch@camelot.name: moloch
moloch@camelot.description: Moloch snarls and reaches for your throat.

marsha@camelot.name: marsha
marsha@camelot.description: Marsha the Kobold Guardsman is here.

taru@camelot.name: taru
taru@camelot.description: Taru the Falconer is ready to feed his birds.

bael@camelot.name: bael
bael@camelot.description: Bael hasn't killed anybody in weeks. He'll try to remember how...

koorina@camelot.name: koorina
koorina@camelot.description: Koorina the Groundskeeper says 'Hey, watch your big feet!'

nalfeshnee@camelot.name: nalfeshnee
nalfeshnee@camelot.description: Look out! He was hiding beside the door behind you!

armadillo@camelot.name: armadillo
armadillo@camelot.description: A Spanish armadillo is here, looking for pickles.

reisi@camelot.name: reisi
reisi@camelot.description: Reisi says 'Go ahead, make my reset...'

peregrine@camelot.name: peregrine
peregrine@camelot.description: A Peregrine falcon swoops down from the sky.

palli@camelot.name: palli
palli@camelot.description: Palli the Dog Trainer says 'Bruno! Fang! Spike! Sic 'em boys!'

andred@camelot.name: andred
andred@camelot.description: Sir Andred wants to go pillage the village. He'll start with you!

vuno@camelot.name: vuno
vuno@camelot.description: Vuno takes this guard job seriously, doesn't he...

jyri@camelot.name: jyri
jyri@camelot.description: Jyri the Armorer is here, forging a new sword.

balor@camelot.name: balor
balor@camelot.description: Balor climbs down off his rock and rushes towards you.

katriina@camelot.name: katriina
katriina@camelot.description: Katriina leaps to bar your way and asks 'What do you think you're doing?'.

cara@camelot.name: cara
cara@camelot.description: Cara the baby kobold lies here. He thinks your fingers look yummy.

cavebear@camelot.name: cavebear
cavebear@camelot.description: There is a huge Cave Bear in here. And he's hungry!

bella@camelot.name: bella
bella@camelot.description: Bella the off-duty guardsman is here.

duergar@camelot.name: duergar
duergar@camelot.description: A Duergar climbs out of the slimy water and attacks.

kay@camelot.name: kay
kay@camelot.description: Sir Kay, Seneschal, bids you welcome and asks your business here.

hector@camelot.name: hector
hector@camelot.description: Sir Hector hates it when people interrupt his meditations.

gringamore@camelot.name: gringamore
gringamore@camelot.description: Sir Gringamore is here, and man does he look mean!

vaino@camelot.name: vaino
vaino@camelot.description: Vaino is sharpening his sword. I wonder how it got dulled?

seapas@camelot.name: seapas
seapas@camelot.description: Seapas woke up in a really bad mood today. Don't bug him.

crusher@camelot.name: crusher
crusher@camelot.description: Crusher, Merlin's latest creation, is waiting here.

galahad@camelot.name: galahad
galahad@camelot.description: Sir Galahad, the White Knight, is here.

talonen@camelot.name: talonen
talonen@camelot.description: Talonen the Gardener says 'Watch your step, there's veggies there!'

kirsi@camelot.name: kirsi
kirsi@camelot.description: Kirsi the guardsman paces out his patrol.

phelot@camelot.name: phelot
phelot@camelot.description: Sir Phelot has a hangover, and the icy water is not helping any!

buddy@camelot.name: buddy
buddy@camelot.examine:
He looks friendly and very powerful at the same time.
You can't believe what you are seeing. It is Arthur himself! He is looking
for something, perhaps you could help him...
buddy@camelot.description:
The mighty King Arthur is here. He says''You can call me
buddy.'

marilith@camelot.name: marilith
marilith@camelot.description: Marilith smiles happily and reaches for you. Not for a hug though...

jallu@camelot.name: jallu
jallu@camelot.description: Jallu draws his sword and says 'And where do you think you're going?'

grippli@camelot.name: grippli
grippli@camelot.description: A Grippli leaps at you from atop the rocks!

firedemon@camelot.name: firedemon
firedemon@camelot.description: There is a Fire Demon here, and he wants your soul!

mika@camelot.name: mika
mika@camelot.description: Mika is here, on his patrol.

teuvo@camelot.name: teuvo
teuvo@camelot.description: Teuvo was resting here. Until you walked in and disturbed him.

hoppari@camelot.name: hoppari
hoppari@camelot.description: Hoppari thinks you look like a wandering bum, and wants to throw you out.

questor@camelot.name: questor
questor@camelot.description: The Questing Beast is here, trying to hide from King Pellinore.

mikka@camelot.name: mikka
mikka@camelot.description: Mikka holds his pike ready, baring your path.

demogorgon@camelot.name: demogorgon
demogorgon@camelot.description: Demogorgon doesn't look like he's in the mood to play today...

dumbar@camelot.name: dumbar
dumbar@camelot.description: Dumbar the blacksmith comes to see if he can help you.

jalovoara@camelot.name: jalovoara
jalovoara@camelot.description: Jalovoara the Orcharder is picking fresh fruit for dessert tonight.

gareth@camelot.name: gareth
gareth@camelot.description: Sir Gareth says 'Why have you disturbed my rest?'

tiina@camelot.name: tiina
tiina@camelot.description: Tiina is standing vigilant watch here.

mirlyn@camelot.name: mirlyn
mirlyn@camelot.description: Mirlyn the Magician is looking for a woman to saw in half. Know of any?

kati@camelot.name: kati
kati@camelot.description: You have interrupted Kati's coffee break.

corledge@camelot.name: corledge
corledge@camelot.description: Corledge the Cave Wight blacksmith looks angry at your intrusion.

jarmo@camelot.name: jarmo
jarmo@camelot.description: I'm Sgt Jarmo. Who the hell are you?

morgana@camelot.name: morgana
morgana@camelot.description: You have interupted Morgana Le Fay in one of her plots against Arthur!

jerome@camelot.name: jerome
jerome@camelot.description: Jerome the Valet is considering what to lay out for the feast tonight.

katar@camelot.name: katar
katar@camelot.description: Katar wants to sell you some Dragon bits. What sort of dragon do you have?

uwaine@camelot.name: uwaine
uwaine@camelot.description: Sir Uwaine sits here quietly, lost in his thoughts.

mongrelman@camelot.name: mongrelman
mongrelman@camelot.description: The favorite sport of the Mongrelman is killing.

baasheeba@camelot.name: baasheeba
baasheeba@camelot.description: Baasheeba the off-duty guardsman is here.

palomides@camelot.name: palomides
palomides@camelot.description: Sir Palomides the Saracen draws his scimitar and turns to meet you.

millionaire@camelot.name: millionaire
millionaire@camelot.description: The millionaire sure seems bored, despite all the money people are giving him.

lionel@camelot.name: lionel
lionel@camelot.description: Sir Lionel is practicing his swordplay. Would you like to play?

kurtulmak@camelot.name: kurtulmak
kurtulmak@camelot.description: Kurtulmak the Supreme Kobold sneers contemptuously at you.

kirtesnie@camelot.name: kirtesnie
kirtesnie@camelot.description: Kirtesnie the Carpenter says 'I'll be done here in a minute.'

eki@camelot.name: eki
eki@camelot.description: Eki the Hostler just finished polishing the tack.

himo@camelot.name: himo
himo@camelot.description: Himo the guard is here, protecting his masters property.

ensio@camelot.name: ensio
ensio@camelot.description: Ensio thinks you look mighty suspicious.

fletching@camelot.name: fletching
fletching@camelot.description: Fletching, Merlin's favorite bird, dives at your face.

koski@camelot.name: koski
koski@camelot.description: Koski thinks you look like the person who cheated him at cards last night.

naaras@camelot.name: naaras
naaras@camelot.description: Naaras smiles happily as he walks his rounds.

hue@camelot.name: hue
hue@camelot.description: Sir Hue raises a hue and cry about the lack of provisions!

make@camelot.name: make
make@camelot.description: Make is napping in the corner. Must be his break huh?

alligator@camelot.name: alligator
alligator@camelot.description: There's a big, hungry alligator sitting here.

erkki@camelot.name: erkki
erkki@camelot.description: Erkki is here, making his rounds.

pellinore@camelot.name: pellinore
pellinore@camelot.description: King Pellinore is looking for Questor, The Questing Beast.

spede@camelot.name: spede
spede@camelot.description: Spede sneers at you in contempt.

spike@camelot.name: spike
spike@camelot.description: Spike looks ready to eat you for lunch.

leech@camelot.name: leech
leech@camelot.description: Gross! There's a huge disgusting leech in here!

jussi@camelot.name: jussi
jussi@camelot.description: Jussi wonders what you are doing in here.

bartender@camelot.name: bartender
bartender@camelot.description: Bart the Bartender asks what you'd like to drink.

damas@camelot.name: damas
damas@camelot.description: Sir Damas is here, checking on his horse.

ewaine@camelot.name: ewaine
ewaine@camelot.description: Duke Ewaine says 'Stop! None may pass save with the Kings leave!'

gawaine@camelot.name: gawaine
gawaine@camelot.description: Sir Gawaine has been sharpening his sword. He would like to test it now.

asko@camelot.name: asko
asko@camelot.description: Asko thinks you are here to practice swordsmanship with.

percivale@camelot.name: percivale
percivale@camelot.description: Sir Percivale is here, thinking about the Grail Quest.

raccoon@camelot.name: raccoon
raccoon@camelot.description: There is a raccoon digging through the trash looking for his lunch.

bertha@camelot.name: bertha
bertha@camelot.description: Bertha the off-duty guardsman is here.
